name: Order Up! (madjuse, CyborgButOk, glibbert, Bough, pichelle)
name_original: Order Up! (madjuse, CyborgButOk, glibbert, Bough, pichelle)
description:
A cat and a dog walk into a restaurant. The cat is the chef and the dog is the waiter. That's it. This wasn't going to be a joke. Have fun ;^))!!

Controls

Move - WASD

Swap Characters - Space

Interact - E

Interact: pick up ingredients, place ingredients in stove, pick up plate, move cooked dish to plate, throw away cooked food and/or ingredients, pick up/place down plate, give plate to customer

Pause - Esc

How To Play

Wait for a customer to order. When a customer order bubble pops up, click the cookbook icon on the top left to open the cookbook. Collect the ingredients based on the customer's order. Go to the stove to cook your ingredients. Grab a plate and go to the stove to collect the cooked food. Give the plate to the customer!!

Credits

Team Lead - Ethan Madjus

Art - Leyna Ho, Julienne Madjus, Danica Jew, Britney Phan, Megan Tsoi

Game Design - Skylar-Lee Stefanov, Ethan Madjus

Music - Ethan Madjus

Programmers - Jane He, Ethan Madjus, Karson Tran, Megan Tsoi, Ricky Yoshida

UI/UX - Douzi Ma, Michelle Pak

Note: Currently an endless game :^]
